title: Oscars 2017 Red Carpet: What the Stars Wore | Rolling Stone

organizations.name: stars wore | rolling stone johnny cash

text:
Johnny Cash's 11 Coolest Covers Oscars 2017: Photos From the Red Carpet See Emma Stone, Mahershala Ali, Octavia Spencer, Justin Timberlake John Legend, Chrissy Teigen, Dev Patel, Andrew Garfield on Hollywood's biggest night 18 Christopher Polk/Getty 11 minutes ago 
The contenders for the 2017 Academy Awards arrived Sunday night for Hollywood's biggest night. The celebrities certainly weren't shy about showing off glitz and glamour. The 89th Academy Awards air February 26th on ABC with Jimmy Kimmel as host.
